channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @ZacharyBraiterm The longterm argument, going back at least to Rabin, was that Israel needed to join the Sunni alliance to prevent the Iranian bomb. The bomb is what Bibi has his friends at Warner Bros illustrate for his UN talk.
item.source:markdown: @ZacharyBraiterm The longterm argument, going back at least to Rabin, was that Israel needed to join the Sunni alliance to prevent the Iranian bomb. The bomb is what Bibi has his friends at Warner Bros illustrate for his UN talk.

item.description:
@ZacharyBraiterm JCPOA takes one of the two off the table, for a time. The War on Iran desired by Bibi has never been explicitly on the table, which is why Trump failed to give it after pulling out of the JCPOA, apparently not understanding the subtext. Ooops!

@ZacharyBraiterm Honesty would require Bibi to say, "Oops, never mind, it was all about the hegemony" and for the RCA to say, "Ooops, it's not about the nukes, it's actually Iranian hegemony that is as big as a threat to the Israeli public as calling women to read from the Torah."
item.source:markdown:
@ZacharyBraiterm JCPOA takes one of the two off the table, for a time. The War on Iran desired by Bibi has never been explicitly on the table, which is why Trump failed to give it after pulling out of the JCPOA, apparently not understanding the subtext. Ooops!
@ZacharyBraiterm Honesty would require Bibi to say, "Oops, never mind, it was all about the hegemony" and for the RCA to say, "Ooops, it's not about the nukes, it's actually Iranian hegemony that is as big as a threat to the Israeli public as calling women to read from the Torah."

item.description: @ZacharyBraiterm Yet reporting on Israel has never said, “ah, never mind, Iranian hegemony is more of a problem than an Iranian bomb.”
item.source:markdown: @ZacharyBraiterm Yet reporting on Israel has never said, “ah, never mind, Iranian hegemony is more of a problem than an Iranian bomb.”

item.description:
@Tzipshmil @SenRickScott A vacation yacht? Probably a negligible fraction of a billion dollar fraud.

@Tzipshmil @SenRickScott If he’s renting, only a few million a week. https://t.co/9NYWyJnu1a

@Tzipshmil @SenRickScott Sadly, there’s no affiliate link so I don’t profit if you decide you too should vacation on a yacht.
@SethCotlar Ben “Biblical values” forgets about the Jubilee.
item.source:markdown: @SethCotlar Ben “Biblical values” forgets about the Jubilee.

item.description: @WinterlightHome @chevrolet Did you buy a car today, or do you hate capitalism?

item.description:
Ask yourself: Are your kidneys innovating? https://t.co/2NQF2pw0iJ

If not, maybe it’s time to set one of the slackers free to find a more innovating home. https://t.co/wUMrXLomb2

item.description: Worth spelling out that closing Palestinian civil society groups based on “terrorism” charges whose evidence that failed to convince the incoming head of the American Jewish Committee puts a lie to the notion that West Bank Palestinians have meaningful autonomy. https://t.co/0TsWpF7jwK
